trans-unit.source: The ISEMenuItem Object
trans-unit.target: The ISEMenuItem Object

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: The ISEMenuItem Object
trans-unit.target: The ISEMenuItem Object

trans-unit.source: An **ISEMenuItem** object is an instance of the Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISEMenuItem class.
trans-unit.target: An **ISEMenuItem** object is an instance of the Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISEMenuItem class.

trans-unit.source: All menu objects on the **Add-ons** menu are instances of the **Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISEMenuItem** class.
trans-unit.target: All menu objects on the **Add-ons** menu are instances of the **Microsoft.PowerShell.Host.ISE.ISEMenuItem** class.

trans-unit.source: Properties
trans-unit.target: Properties

trans-unit.source: DisplayName
trans-unit.target: DisplayName

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.

trans-unit.source: The read-only property that gets the display name of the menu item.
trans-unit.target: The read-only property that gets the display name of the menu item.

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Action

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.

trans-unit.source: The read-only property that gets the block of script.
trans-unit.target: The read-only property that gets the block of script.

trans-unit.source: It invokes the action when you click the menu item.
trans-unit.target: It invokes the action when you click the menu item.

trans-unit.source: Shortcut
trans-unit.target: Shortcut

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.

trans-unit.source: The read-only property that gets the Windows input keyboard shortcut for the menu item.
trans-unit.target: The read-only property that gets the Windows input keyboard shortcut for the menu item.

trans-unit.source: Submenus
trans-unit.target: Submenus

trans-unit.source: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.
trans-unit.target: Supported in Windows PowerShell ISE 2.0 and later.

trans-unit.source: The read-only property that gets the [list of submenus](The-ISEMenuItemCollection-Object.md) of the menu item.
trans-unit.target: The read-only property that gets the [list of submenus](The-ISEMenuItemCollection-Object.md) of the menu item.

trans-unit.source: Scripting example
trans-unit.target: Scripting example

trans-unit.source: To better understand the use of the Add-ons menu and its scriptable properties, read through the following scripting example.
trans-unit.target: To better understand the use of the Add-ons menu and its scriptable properties, read through the following scripting example.
